Text: Thanks for the up, but Audio #2 is both English and Russian at the same time.....
you must have selected both audio tracks?

I am not sure,
For some reason when I select the english there is no audio, then when I select the Russian there are both... Tested. Nothing wrong with the file. Try installing CCCP and select audio#2. It is only English.
